entry.title: Of Spire & Throne - Vagary - 가사
entry.content:
lay claim to seek
the restless wake
another year wracked and laden
abandoned to the channelled past
a sense of latent shifting
dormant or waning or growing
the pleading eye
to the lifeless hand
the perversion of this framing
forever mute and distorted
a nameless charge
signifying
nothing
lay claim pass on
engulf or sustain
seek forgiveness
to find a way
to purge
consumed and unable
to quell the weight
consumed and unable
i follow
